mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_examination.class_paper ORDER BY id
mapper.update: UPDATE db_examination.class_paper SET classId = #{classId}, paperId = #{paperId}, time = #{time}, assistantId = #{assistantId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c1.title, c2.title AS course_title, cp.time FROM db_examination.class c1 INNER JOIN db_examination.paper p INNER JOIN db_examination.class_paper cp INNER JOIN db_examination.course c2 ON c1.id = cp.classId AND p.id = cp.paperId AND c2.id = p.courseId ORDER BY cp.time;

SELECT p.id, c2.title, cp.time FROM db_examination.student s INNER JOIN db_examination.class c1 INNER JOIN db_examination.class_paper cp INNER JOIN db_examination.paper p INNER JOIN db_examination.course c2 ON s.classId = c1.id AND c1.id = cp.classId AND cp.paperId = p.id AND p.courseId = c2.id WHERE now() > cp.time AND date_add(cp.time, INTERVAL p.time MINUTE) > now() /* < or < & or & */
